removeFavorite.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
removeFavorite.tagline: Every generation has a legend. Every journey has a first step. Every saga has a beginning.
removeFavorite.overview: Anakin Skywalker, a young slave strong with the Force, is discovered on Tatooine. Meanwhile, the evil Sith have returned, enacting their plot for revenge against the Jedi.
